metadata.title: Hash Generator - Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 Hashes | tool-chest
metadata.description: Free online hash generator for MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, and other hash algorithms. Generate secure hashes for text and files with client-side processing.

md5.title: MD5
md5.description: 128-bit hash function. Fast but not cryptographically secure. Use for checksums only.

sha1.title: SHA-1
sha1.description: 160-bit hash function. Legacy algorithm, use SHA-256+ for security applications.
